entry.title: Julien added 'The Lady in the Lake'
entry.content: 📚 “The Lady in the Lake” by Raymond Chandler ⭐️ Rated: 5/5 📝 "The Lady in the Lake is arguably Chandler’s best Marlowe novel, a top-notch mystery with a brilliantly twisted ending. But more than just the plot, it’s Chandler’s writing that elevates the book: he turns noir fiction into true literature with his sharp prose and effortlessly smooth style. Marlowe is an outstanding character, and the vivid, often poetic descriptions are a huge part of what makes this such a joy to read. —— The Lady in the Lake est sans doute le meilleur Marlowe de Chandler. Une..." 🏷️ #RaymondChandler
